page.title: 11BMX
page.content:
In Sudbury there is a growing craze called BMX, the initials stand for Bicycle Moto Cross. About 350 young people have BMX bikes in Sudbury and the best place for them to ride is a dirt track and trick ramp at Woodhall Barn. There are two aspects of the sport, racing and freestyle. Racing involves riding around a track with obstacles on it as fast as you can. Freestyle is trick riding- pulling off stunts on your bike. I am in a trick team called the Rad Lads and we show off our stunts to other people. The tricks need a great deal of skill and have names like Miami Hopper.
By: Adam Pickett.
